title: BRIEF-Nick Scali Says Currently Expects HY NPAT Will Be In Range Of $17M-$19M
text:
BRIEF-Nick Scali Says Currently Expects HY NPAT Will Be In Range Of $17M-$19M

Stock Markets 4 minutes ago (Oct 15, 2019 20:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Nick Scali Says Currently Expects HY NPAT Will Be In Range Of $17M-$19M Oct 15 (Reuters) - Nick Scali Ltd : * CURRENTLY EXPECTS THAT NPAT FOR HALF-YEAR ENDING 31 DECEMBER 2019 WILL BE IN RANGE OF $17M-$19M * DIFFICULT TRADING CONDITIONS HAVE CONTINUED INTO FIRST 3 MONTHS OF CURRENT FY * LOWER INTEREST RATES AND SIGNS OF IMPROVEMENT IN NUMBER OF HOUSING TRANSACTIONS MAY TRANSLATE TO A LIFT IN SALES IN H2

BRIEF-Nick Scali Says Currently Expects HY NPAT Will Be In Range Of $17M-$19M
